info.title: Global Property Price Index
info.description: A listing of real estate stats by City, Country, Latitude	Longitude of 	Price To Income Ratio,	Gross Rental Yield City Centre,	Gross Rental Yield Outside of Centre,	Price To Rent, Ratio City Centre,	Price To Rent Ratio Outside Of City Centre,	Mortgage As A Percentage Of Income,	Affordability Index.

parameters.name: $page
parameters.description: Number of the page to retrieve. Integer value. sample = 1

parameters.name: $sort
parameters.description: Order in which to retrieve the results. Multiple sort criteria can be passed. Example: sort=age ASC,height DESC
